casebody.data:
Raymond Alan GRIFFIN
v.
Deborah SHANDLES, Assistant District Attorney of Wake County
and
Paul C. Ridgeway, Senior Resident Superior Court Judge
v.
John and Jane Doe
and
Raymond Alan Griffin
v.
Deborah Shandles, Assistant District Attorney of Wake County
and
Donald W. Stephens, Senior Resident Superior Court Judge
v.
John and Jane Doe No. 322P15-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 9, 2018 Mr. Raymond Alan Griffin, For Griffin, Raymond Alan. Mr. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of N.C.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of December 2017 by Petitioner for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of January 2018."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 28th of December 2017 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of January 2018."
